author: andreas
content: Oh, interesting. I didn't know that and all the reviews at www.imaging-resource.com, www.dpreview.com and www.dcresource.com tell me otherwise, nor do I find the feature in Fuji's PDF online manual. I know, it's  preposterous to ask, but are you sure you don't confuse it with your D300? If not, it might be the best hidden feature in camera history ðŸ™‚
